articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Stirling hits milestone as Ireland beat West Indies
articles.description: Paul Stirling becomes the first Irish player to reach 10,000 career runs in ODI, T20 and Test matches combined as Ireland beat West Indies in their opening ODI at Clontarf.
articles.content:
Paul Stirling became the first Irish player to reach 10,000 international runs as Ireland comfortably beat West Indies in the opening one-day international at Clontarf.

articles.title: Glenn Maxwell retires from ODI cricket but T20 World Cup in his sights
articles.description: Maxwell, known as one of the game's most powerful hitters, is calling time on his one-day career with Australia.
articles.content:
